interpretation.title: Proactive willingness to help
interpretation.explanation: When activated, the speaker readily agrees to assist or take responsibility, offering concrete, immediate, solution-oriented actions (e.g., committing now, proposing specific steps, collaborative follow-through). When suppressed, they hesitate, defer, or decline, citing constraints and avoiding direct action.
